subject: what is Mock objects and cactus tests?
msgSnippet: Hi friends, We  have a planning to use junit testing technologies for our full java development  like java beans, Core java,  Servlet, JSP, DB, EJB. I know how
messageBody:
Hi friends,
We have a planning to use junit testing technologies
for our full java development like java beans, Core
java, Servlet, JSP, DB, EJB. I know how to use junit
but I want to know mock objects and cactus test both
cover all my requirements is it correct.

My questions
1. What is a mock object? Is an API or we have to
develop our own mock object
2. When we go for mock object?
3. Cactus test support servlet,DB,JSP and EJB or we
have to go to any other tools?

Please give a brief information about my questions

Thanks and Regards
Kabarnacius
